Name: Casual Golf
About the game: In this arcade game you will send a golf ball to the hole. Use the mouse keys to adjust the direction and strength of the ball hit. Each level has a limited number of hits, and the increasing complexity of the levels is due to the addition of obstacles in the form of blocks, steep slopes, objects and missing obstacles.
